        public void enqueueing(int p,
                       IConstr reason)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: SearchListener
        Fixes the truth value of a variable before propagating it. For all calls to enqueueing(p,_) there should be a call to propagating(p) unless a conflict is found.
